opis: KUĆA, PRODAJA, KRK, VRBNIK, 99 m2, 3-sobna Prodaje se prekrasna novouređena kamena kuća u Vrbniku na otoku Krku iz koje se pruža jedinstven panoramski pogled na more. Kuća se sastoji od tri etaže : PRIZEMLJE : dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, zaseban toalet te terasa površine 60 m2 s jacuzzijem I. KAT : spavaća soba s kupaonicom II. KAT : spavaća soba s kupaonicom Kuća je kompletno renovirana 2022. godine. Na svakoj etaži je provedeno podno grijanje, klimatizacijski uređaji za hlađenje te satelitske televizije. U prizemlju kuće provedeno je Sonus ozvučenje. Prodaje se kompletno namještena. Kuća posjeduje jedno vanjsko parking mjesto površine 40 m2. Kuća se nalazi na sjajnoj lokaciji s prekrasnim pogledom u mjestu Vrbnik na otoku Krku. Udaljenost do mora svega 10 minuta pješice. Nalazi se na istočnoj strani otoka Krka. Smješten je na litici koja se strmo uzdiže 50-ak metara iznad mora. S obzirom na mirnu lokaciju i predivan pogled na more, kuća je idealna kao investicija s već uhodanim poslom. Vlasništvo uredno. Kuća posjeduje Uporabnu dozvolu. Mogućnost kupnje putem kredita. HOUSE FOR SALE, KRK, VRBNIK, 99 m², 3-ROOM A beautiful newly renovated stone house is for sale in Vrbnik on the island of Krk, offering a unique panoramic view of the sea. The house consists of three levels: GROUND FLOOR: Living room with kitchen and dining area, separate toilet, and a 60 m² terrace with a jacuzzi. FIRST FLOOR: Bedroom with bathroom. SECOND FLOOR: Bedroom with bathroom. The house was fully renovated in 2022. Each floor has underfloor heating, air conditioning, and satellite TV. The ground floor features Sonus sound system installation. The house is being sold fully furnished. The property includes one outdoor parking space with an area of 40 m2. The house is situated in a great location with a beautiful view in the town of Vrbnik on the island of Krk. The distance to the sea is only a 10-minute walk. It is located on the eastern side of the island, perched on a cliff about 50 meters above the sea. Given its peaceful location and stunning sea view, the house is an ideal investment with an already established rental business. Ownership is clear. The house has a Usage Permit.
